title: The Weaponization Timeline
key_scenes: Elliot uses device to access Branch 47 weaponization timeline
Experiences timeline where he cooperated with Reyes
Multiple nations develop competing temporal manipulation tech
Timeline fragments from temporal pressure of forced interventions
Returns to present understanding stakes of resistance
Team decides to accelerate timeline and embed warnings in signal
Realizes warning text from Nov 1st came from Branch 47 Elliot
revelations: Branch 47 shows weaponization timeline where Elliot cooperated
Government created Project Causality Shield for timeline manipulation
Multiple nations developed competing temporal tech
Timeline resistance creates temporal pressure that builds to breaking
Forced causality manipulation led to nuclear war 2034, 8 billion dead
Warning text that helped Elliot was from failed Branch 47
Failed timelines send warnings to future iterations through quantum entanglement
Signal must contain full data or loop fails - can't delete dangerous knowledge

Branch 47 Elliot's warning across timelines (noble failure)
Signal engineering to select for specific personality types
Timeline resistance to forced manipulation (natural law)
Warnings embedded in signal for future iterations (payoff Ch60)

themes_explored: Authority vs autonomy in existential stakes
